config.title: Talks and Workshops
config.subtitle: I have experience giving talks in different topics such as Software, Entrepreneurship and Product, as well as workshops. I've organized a technical workshop sponsored by Github and co-organized Iniciador.

callToAction.claim: Do you have an event and want jorge to be a speaker or co-organiser? Write an email or contact.

pastTalks.title: Introducing Redis by Jorge Ferreiro - May 2017
pastTalks.summary: Introduced Redis, a key-value NoSQL database, to 30 college students. I talked about introductory concepts, features and shared a practical case.

pastTalks.title: PresentaciÃ³n Dailyfocus (incluye DEMO! ðŸ”¥) - 16 minutos - FDI UCM
pastTalks.summary: Presentation of my personal project Dailyfocus, where I explained the engineering, product design, business and my personal experience.

pastTalks.title: Dailyfocus at #JsDayEs 2017 - Jorge Ferreiro
pastTalks.summary: Brief introduction of Dailyfocus at JSDayEs (top Javascript event in Spain). Challenged by the organizer to prepare it in just 5 minutes!

pastTalks.title: Dailyfocus presentation (June 2017): vision, product, tech and journey
pastTalks.summary: Presensation made for an academic jury from my college. I mainly cover: challenges, vision and goals, development process, lessons learned, etc.

pastTalks.title: Workshop: Your first professional website (sponsored by Github.com)
pastTalks.summary: I organized and run this workshop for more than 50 students in my college. I taught how to create a professional website from scratch to deployment.

pastTalks.title: Webapps: introduction and publishing on Firefox OS
pastTalks.summary: I was invited by Mozilla Spain to talk about: Webapps, how to create them and my experience creating Music4deejays, a streaming music app.
